C#: if (i<10) {     // condition is true  } else if (othercondition) {      // condition is false and othercondition is true } else {      // condition and othercondition are false  }
Visual Basic .NET: <source lang=vbnet> If condition Then    ' condition is true  ElseIf othercondition Then    ' condition is false and othercondition is true  Else    ' condition and othercondition false  End If </source>
